official-title.#text:
To amend the Honoring the Families of Fallen Soldiers Act to provide a permanent appropriation of
			 funds for the payment of death gratuities for survivors of deceased
			 members of the uniformed services in event of any future period of lapsed
			 appropriations.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

header.#text:
Permanent appropriation of funds for payment of death gratuities for survivors of members of the
			 uniformed services in event of a period of lapsed appropriations

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Department of Defense Survivor Benefits Continuing Appropriations Resolution, 2014

Department of Defense Survivor Benefits Continuing Appropriations Resolution, 2014/s:101

, subsequent fiscal years whenever there is a period of lapsed
			 appropriations
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Department of Defense Survivor Benefits Continuing Appropriations Resolution, 2014/s:101/ss:c

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , by adding at the end the following new subsection:
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Department of Defense Survivor Benefits Continuing Appropriations Resolution, 2014/s:101

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, for the purpose of making such
			 death gratuity payments for survivors of deceased members of the uniformed
			 services during the period of lapsed appropriations.

text.#text:
During any subsequent period of lapsed appropriations during a fiscal year, such amounts as may be
			 necessary, at a rate for operations as provided for the most recent fiscal
			 year for which an Act making appropriations for the uniformed services (as
			 defined in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Department of Defense Survivor Benefits Continuing Appropriations Resolution, 2014/s:101/ss:c/p:1
Department of Defense Survivor Benefits Continuing Appropriations Resolution, 2014/s:103
Department of Defense Survivor Benefits Continuing Appropriations Resolution, 2014/s:101/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
) or full-year appropriations for the
			 accounts referred to in
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Department of Defense Survivor Benefits Continuing Appropriations Resolution, 2014/s:101/ss:c/p:1
Department of Defense Survivor Benefits Continuing Appropriations Resolution, 2014/s:101/ss:c/p:1

quote.#tail:
means any period of time after the start of a fiscal year for which interim (other than pursuant
			 to

Section 103 of the Department of Defense Survivor Benefits Continuing Appropriations Resolution,
			 2014

of this
			 joint resolution shall be available whenever there is a period of lapsed
			 appropriations for the duration of the period of lapsed appropriations.
